name: Brink of Consciousness (Full)
description:
Help Sam Wilde rescue his love, Anna, in Brink of Consciousness: Dorian Gray Syndrome - an incredible Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game! Sam's every move is being tracked, so he has to be extra careful. Putting his journalistic talents to the test, Sam must find the maniac who kidnapped Anna and stop him before it's too late! Explore gorgeous locations, track down a twisted serial killer, and solve mind-bending puzzles in Brink of Consciousness: Dorian Gray Syndrome!

☆☆☆☆☆ Features ☆☆☆☆☆

✓ Begin your discrete investigation
✓ Stop an evil maniac!
✓ Your every move is being watched!

✓ Unlock the Collector's Edition for access to exciting extras like:
--Integrated Strategy Guide
--Creepy soundtrack and eerie wallpapers
--Exclusive concept art and Oscar comics!
--See an interview with the game developers!
